org.apache.flink.graph.spargel

类 ScatterGatherConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.IterationConfiguration
      • org.apache.flink.graph.spargel.ScatterGatherConfiguration

  • public class ScatterGatherConfiguration
extends IterationConfiguration
    A ScatterGatherConfiguration object can be used to set the iteration name and degree of parallelism, to register aggregators and use broadcast sets in the GatherFunction and ScatterFunction The VertexCentricConfiguration object is passed as an argument to ( org.apache.flink.graph.spargel.GatherFunction, org.apache.flink.graph.spargel.ScatterFunction, int, ScatterGatherConfiguration).

    • 方法详细资料

      • addBroadcastSetForScatterFunction

        public void addBroadcastSetForScatterFunction(String name,
                                              org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?> data)
        Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the scatter function.
        参数:
        name - The name under which the broadcast data is available in the scatter function.
        data - The data set to be broadcasted.

      • addBroadcastSetForGatherFunction

        public void addBroadcastSetForGatherFunction(String name,
                                             org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?> data)
        Adds a data set as a broadcast set to the gather function.
        参数:
        name - The name under which the broadcast data is available in the gather function.
        data - The data set to be broadcasted.

      • getScatterBcastVars

        public List<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?>>> getScatterBcastVars()
        Get the broadcast variables of the ScatterFunction.
        返回:
        a List of Tuple2, where the first field is the broadcast variable name and the second field is the broadcast DataSet.

      • getGatherBcastVars

        public List<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<String,org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<?>>> getGatherBcastVars()
        Get the broadcast variables of the GatherFunction.
        返回:
        a List of Tuple2, where the first field is the broadcast variable name and the second field is the broadcast DataSet.

      • isOptDegrees

        public boolean isOptDegrees()
        Gets whether the degrees option is set. By default, the degrees option is not set.
        返回:
        True, if the degree option is set, false otherwise.

      • setOptDegrees

        public void setOptDegrees(boolean optDegrees)
        Sets the degree option. By default, the degrees option is not set.
        参数:
        optDegrees - True, to set this option, false otherwise.

      • getDirection

        public EdgeDirection getDirection()
        Gets the direction in which messages are sent in the ScatterFunction. By default the messaging direction is OUT.
        返回:
        an EdgeDirection, which can be either IN, OUT or ALL.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(EdgeDirection direction)
        Sets the direction in which messages are sent in the ScatterFunction. By default the messaging direction is OUT.
        参数:
        direction - - IN, OUT or ALL
